title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.11 - Speed limit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.11 - Speed limit

State Regulations

No person shall drive a vehicle on college streets, roads or highways at a speed greater than is reasonable and prudent under the
conditions and having regard to the actual and potential hazards then existing, but in no event shall a person drive a vehicle in excess of 20 miles per hour
unless a different speed is authorized and indicated by the college. (a) Saratoga Drive from Warnerville Cutoff
through the Equine Facility shall have a maximum speed limit of 10 miles per
hour. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
573.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
